description: A shaggy, high-pile Sherpa outside with soft, blanket-like microfleece on the inside makes for maximum warmth and coziness.  Wear this versatile full-zip on its own or as an insulating midlayer under a shell.
name: Columbia Sportswear Winter Pass Print Fleece Full Zip - Mens

specs.value: 100% Polyester Sherpa Pile face Microfleece back
